encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: redo square brackets in i.1; dot omega in i.2; renumber lost.5lin as line 3, and then the subsequent line as i.8; move $m2 to interlin and remove space before αύτην; correct hyphen at line break in i.7 and elsewhere; change scribal apostrophe in i.8 to diastole; insert lost.?lin at head of column ii; correct accent on article in ii.10; delete |ed| markup in ii.10-11; correct the accent on καί in ii.19; remove braces and correct a to alpha at start of ii.21; code ii.23 as scribal correction. META: delete volume # from 95231; add #3 to 4392; insert image link (http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH0132.dir/POxy.v0017.n2097.a.01.hires.jpg); change display name to P. Oxy. 17 2097 and delete legacy name; add CWKB numbers for Herodotus (915, 2691); MP3 is 464; correct the spelling of Oxyrhynchus and add Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983)

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: redo square brackets in i.1; dot omega in i.2; renumber lost.5lin as line 3, and then the subsequent line as i.8; move $m2 to interlin and remove space before αύτην; correct hyphen at line break in i.7 and elsewhere; change scribal apostrophe in i.8 to diastole; insert lost.?lin at head of column ii; correct accent on article in ii.10; delete |ed| markup in ii.10-11; correct the accent on καί in ii.19; remove braces and correct a to alpha at start of ii.21; code ii.23 as scribal correction. META: delete volume # from 95231; add #3 to 4392; insert image link (http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH0132.dir/POxy.v0017.n2097.a.01.hires.jpg); change display name to P. Oxy. 17 2097 and delete legacy name; add CWKB numbers for Herodotus (915, 2691); MP3 is 464; correct the spelling of Oxyrhynchus and add Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983)

Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2017.12.07 by Elizabeth Keyser. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission notes were: “Submitted as project in Todd Hickey's Herodotus class“
